description: The StormLine Stretch Rain Pants provide the security you need to push your limits no matter what the weather holds. With Black Diamond's BD.dry™ waterproof/breathable solution and stretch fabric, these pants are durable, comfortable and reliable when the storms roll in.
name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Rain Pants - Mens

specs.value: BD.dry™ 2.5L, Two-way stretch woven face with DWR finish (110 gsm, 100% Nylon)
